resources.string:
This app was created by the AlaskaLinuxUser. 
 
 KPPD controls were created by Savoca. 
 
 Photo by Daniel Watson on Unsplash 
 
 Apache license 2.0 
 
 You can always delete the /sdcard/documents/kppd.conf file to return to default settings.
Install the Kcal Post Processing Daemon (KPPD) and configuration files? This will not take long and will exit the app. You can open this app again to see the control panel.
